org::ipdr::protocol::DataException

org::ipdr::protocol::DataException Class Reference


Public Member Functions

 DataException (String msg)
 DataException (Object o, String function, String msg)

Detailed Description

Exception thrown when there's an error in the protocol data. Not to be confused with ProtocolMalformedMsgException, which is used when the message itself is messed up.

See also:
ProtocolMalformedMsgException

Constructor & Destructor Documentation
